name: Winslow Technology
tag_list: sales-outsourcing, sales-agents, lead-generation, ireland, uk, europe, software-europe, sales-cycle
overview:
Winslow Technology provides a sales outsourcing service to software companies in the b2b market and are based in Dublin, Ireland.

They offer a lead generation and new client acquisition facility within the island of Ireland, the UK and Europe on an ‘end to end’ or ‘pay as you need’ basis.

The service is best suited to organisations that have a complex sales cycle and a ‘face to face’ model, with multiple sales interviews as part of their process.

They believe that ‘foreign’ solutions providers, who want to win business in the UK or Ireland have a few choices - commute, establish a local office, repeatedly ‘attack’ (‘Viking Raid’) the market, buy a local competitor or outsource their sales with an agent. The proposition is cost effective, flexible & quicker to deploy.
